tokens.text: defines behavior.slime keep on jumping configuration

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Behavior.slime Keep On Jumping Misc
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows the entity to continuously jump around like a slime.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Determines the multiplier this entity's speed is modified by when jumping around. Default value: 1.
